Article/0-0-0-17/pt-br/componentes-com-e.html:
Componentes com estado s√£o classes que estendem nullstack e s√£o capazes de manter o estado que reflete na interface do usu√°rio.<\/p>

Um framework web full stack produtivo n√£o deve for√ßar voc√™ a pensar sobre detalhes de estrutura.<\/p>

Nullstack assume o controle de suas subclasses e gera um proxy para cada inst√¢ncia.<\/p>

Quando voc√™ invoca qualquer coisa em sua classe, voc√™ est√° na verdade dizendo ao Nullstack o que fazer com o ambiente nos bastidores.<\/p>

Isso permite que voc√™ use opera√ß√µes de JavaScript vanilla como atribuir a uma vari√°vel e ver o reflexo no dom.<\/p>

Mutabilidade<\/a><\/h2>

Voc√™ pode modificar vari√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãde inst√¢ncia para atualizar o estado do seu aplicativo.<\/p>

As fun√ß√µes s√£o vinculadas automaticamente ao proxy da inst√¢ncia e podem ser passadas como refer√™ncia para eventos.<\/p>

Os eventos s√£o declarados como atributos HTML normais.<\/p> 

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> "nullstack"<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  count =<\/span> 0<\/span>;<\/span>

  increment<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    this<\/span>.<\/span>count++<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>increment}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        {<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count}<\/span>
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>



üí° As atualiza√ß√µes s√£o feitas em lotes, geralmente enquanto aguardam chamadas ass√≠ncronas, portanto, fazer v√°rias atribui√ß√µes n√£o tem custos de desempenho!<\/p>
<\/blockquote>

Array de Eventos<\/a><\/h2>
Voc√™ pode passar um array de eventos como prop e eles ser√£o executados em paralelo<\/p>

Voc√™ tamb√©m pode passar valores falsos para pular eventos condicionalmente.<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  count =<\/span> 0<\/span>;<\/span>

  increment<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    this<\/span>.<\/span>count++<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  log<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    console.<\/span>log<\/span>(<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  logUnlessZero<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    console.<\/span>log<\/span>(<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count ><\/span> 0<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>
  
  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>[<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>increment,<\/span> this<\/span>.<\/span>log,<\/span> this<\/span>.<\/span>count ><\/span> 0<\/span> &&<\/span> this<\/span>.<\/span>logUnlessZero]<\/span>}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span> 
        {<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count}<\/span>
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

Objeto de Eventos<\/a><\/h2>
Voc√™ pode criar atalho em eventos que s√£o simples atribui√ß√µes passando um objeto para o evento.<\/p>

Cada chave do objeto ser√° atribu√≠da √† inst√¢ncia.<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> "nullstack"<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  count =<\/span> 0<\/span>;<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>{<\/span> count<\/span>:<\/span> this<\/span>.<\/span>count +<\/span> 1<\/span> }<\/span>}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        {<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count}<\/span>
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

Fonte de Evento<\/a><\/h2>
Por padr√£o, os eventos referem-se a this<\/code> quando voc√™ passa um objeto.<\/p>

Voc√™ pode usar o atributo source<\/code> para definir qual objeto receber√° as atribui√ß√µes.<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> "nullstack"<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Paginator<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span> params }<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> source<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>params}<\/span><\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>{<\/span> page<\/span>:<\/span> 1<\/span> }<\/span>}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        Primeira P<\/span>√°gina
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Paginator;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>



‚ú® Aprenda mais sobre a chave params<\/code> do contexto<\/a>.<\/p>
<\/blockquote>



üí° Se voc√™ n√£o declarar uma fonte para o evento, o Nullstack injetar√° source={this}<\/code> no tempo de transpila√ß√£o para pular completamente o processo de pesquisa em tempo de execu√ß√£o!<\/p>
<\/blockquote>

Contexto de Evento<\/a><\/h2>
Os atributos do elemento-alvo do evento ser√£o mesclados ao context<\/code> da inst√¢ncia e podem ser desestruturados na assinatura da fun√ß√£o.<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> "nullstack"<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  count =<\/span> 0<\/span>;<\/span>

  increment<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span> delta }<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    this<\/span>.<\/span>count +=<\/span> delta;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>increment}<\/span><\/span> delta<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>2<\/span>}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        {<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count}<\/span>
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>



üí° Qualquer atributo com valor primitivo ser√° adicionado ao DOM.<\/p>
<\/blockquote>



‚ú® Considere usar atributos data<\/code><\/a> para tornar seu HTML v√°lido.<\/p>
<\/blockquote>

Evento Original<\/a><\/h2>
O comportamento padr√£o do navegador √© impedido por padr√£o.<\/p>

Voc√™ pode desativar isso declarando um atributo default<\/code> para o elemento de evento.<\/p>

Uma refer√™ncia ao evento original √© sempre mesclada com o contexto da fun√ß√£o.<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> "nullstack"<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Form<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>
  submit<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span> event }<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    event.<\/span>preventDefault<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>form<\/span> onsubmit<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>submit}<\/span><\/span> default<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span> Enviar </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>form<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>
}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Form;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

Eventos Debounced<\/a><\/h2>
Voc√™ pode usar o atributo debounce<\/code> passando um n√∫mero de milissegundos para atrasar os eventos desse elemento<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>
  
  count =<\/span> 0<\/span>

  }<\/span>
  
  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>increment}<\/span><\/span> debounce<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>2000<\/span>}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span> 
        increment 
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

TypeScript<\/a><\/h2>
Componentes com estado aceitam um gen√©rico que reflete nas props que sua tag aceitar√°<\/p>

// src/Counter.tsx<\/span>
import<\/span> Nullstack,<\/span> {<\/span> NullstackClientContext }<\/span> from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

  multiplier<\/span>:<\/span> number 
}<\/span>

  // ...<\/span>

  }<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

<\/code><\/pre>

Componentes internos<\/a><\/h2>
Em vez de criar um novo componente apenas para organizar a divis√£o de c√≥digo, voc√™ pode criar um componente interno.<\/p>

Componentes internos s√£o qualquer m√©todo cujo nome comece com render<\/code> seguido por um caractere mai√∫sculo.<\/p>

Os componentes internos compartilham a mesma inst√¢ncia e escopo do componente principal, portanto, s√£o muito convenientes para evitar problemas como perfura√ß√£o de escoras.<\/p>

Para invocar o componente interno, use uma tag JSX com o nome do m√©todo sem o prefixo render<\/code>.<\/p>

import<\/span> Nullstack,<\/span> {<\/span> NullstackClientContext,<\/span> NullstackNode }<\/span> from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

interface<\/span> CounterProps<\/span> {<\/span>
  multiplier<\/span>:<\/span> number 
}<\/span>

interface<\/span> CounterButtonProps<\/span> {<\/span>
  delta<\/span>:<\/span> number
}<\/span>

declare function<\/span> Button<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>:<\/span> CounterProps<\/span>)<\/span>:<\/span> NullstackNode

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span><<\/span>CounterProps<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span> {<\/span>

  count =<\/span> 0<\/span>;<\/span>

  increment<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span> delta,<\/span> multiplier }<\/span>:<\/span> NullstackClientContext<<\/span>CounterProps &<\/span> CounterButtonProps><\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    this<\/span>.<\/span>count +=<\/span> delta *<\/span> multiplier;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  renderButton<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span> delta =<\/span> 1<\/span> }<\/span>:<\/span> NullstackClientContext<<\/span>CounterProps &<\/span> CounterButtonProps><\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>increment}<\/span><\/span> delta<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>delta}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span> 
        {<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>count}<\/span>
      </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>
  
  render<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>div<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>Button<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>
        <<\/span>Button<\/span><\/span> delta<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>2<\/span>}<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>
      </<\/span>div<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>



üí° Nullstack will inject a constant reference to the function at transpile time in order to completely skip the runtime lookup process!<\/p>
